column1: #Text=" Warehouse worker says : " He manufactured those gloves for the Equalists .
#Text=" Warehouse worker says : " And there are rumors he 's working on something even bigger .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " We searched all of Future Industries and found nothing .
#Text=" Warehouse worker says : " That 's because he has a secret factory .
#Text=" Warehouse worker says : " It 's right underneath the Sato Mansion .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Raiding the Sato Mansion is a risky move with Tarrlok breathing down your neck .
#Text=If we 're wrong ... " Lin says : " I know .
#Text=But protecting Republic City is all I care about .
#Text=We ca n't let Amon get his hands on this new weapon .
